name: Deal with the Devil (ftpixel)
description:
This demo was made in 2 weeks for The Enigma Game Jam.

After a drug bust gone wrong our detective makes a deal with the devil giving him the ability to rise from death and teleport. However this power comes with a price...

Due to time limitations I had to turn my idea into a demo.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look around

Left Click - Shoot

Scroll Wheel - Change weapons

Hold Right Click - Aim at the desired teleportation location

Release Rİght Click - Teleport

ESC - Quit the game at any time
